points.description: Observation: Digitized edges show minor width change over a decade. Bars and banks behave like nearby reference reaches. Criteria: Near-reference lateral change.
Observation: Mild net widening over 10 years with occasional raw banks and quick revegetation. Criteria: Slightly above reference change.
Observation: Width increased well beyond reference. Frequent mass failures or pronounced confinement in places. Criteria: Significantly above or below reference with instability or constraints.
Observation: Rapid over-widening after storms, or planform fully locked by hardening that suppresses natural change. Criteria: Highly accelerated or heavily suppressed outside stable norms.
